comment.author: 24198124@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vietnam/Korea - Australia & Allies 1950/1970s, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 38958089@N03
comment._content: Hi, do you have any more pics of RAR 3 Batallion?  My dad was there, he was 15 years old (he lied about his age to get in and managed to get as far as Korea, then they found out he was underage and sent him home - the army has no record of him yet I have seen the small badge awarded to his UNIT from the 3 batallion by the USA).  Please contact me on wocket1502@yahoo.com.au or send any pics so I can show dad, he may be able to identify people in them,  dad's name was Len Morris (but his real surname was Berry)  he was a Private.  Thank you for any help you can give me - Judy Berry :)
